definitions.definition: A person who localizes ( adapts a product for use in a particular country or region, or adapts translated text to fit a local culture ) .
The component of an instrument landing system that provides runway centerline guidance to aircraft , but not glideslope information.

main_definition: ( computing , translation studies ) A person who localizes ( adapts a product for use in a particular country or region, or adapts translated text to fit a local culture ) .
secondary_definitions: ( aviation ) The component of an instrument landing system that provides runway centerline guidance to aircraft , but not glideslope information.
